name: jtox-kit
description: A JavaScript client library of chem-informatics related widgets, components, etc.

scripts.kits: cat src/kits/*.html | bin/html2js.pl --trim > www/jtox-kit.kits.js && terser www/jtox-kit.kits.js -mc --ie8 --keep-fnames -o www/jtox-kit.kits.min.js && concat src/css/*.css -o www/${npm_package_name}.css
scripts.build: npm run core && npm run kits
scripts.prepare: npm run build && terser $npm_package_main -mc --ie8 --keep-fnames -o www/${npm_package_name}.min.js && cd www && chmod a-w ${npm_package_name}*.js && zip ${npm_package_name}.zip ../LICENSE ${npm_package_name}*
scripts.postpublish: git push && git tag -am "Release $npm_package_version." ${npm_package_version} && git push --tags
